scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name get-video-list --handler index.handler --memory-size 128 --timeout 3 --runtime nodejs8.10 --role arn:aws:iam::536772866969:role/lambda-s3-execution-role --publish --zip-file fileb://Lambda-Deployment.zip --profile study-lambda
scripts.deploy: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name get-video-list --zip-file fileb://Lambda-Deployment.zip --profile study-lambda
